title: Case Analysis for Game-Based Education of Complex Language Cognitive Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the field: foundational grammar comprehension, text interpretation skills, vocabulary application experience
context.additional_context: An asynchronous learning environment for working professionals aiming to enhance language proficiency and problem-solving skills: cultivates abilities in practical document writing, presentation techniques, and workplace communication.

learning_goals: Learners will design three or more language learning strategies using game design principles: vocabulary expansion, contextual comprehension, and enhanced communicative expression.

Learners will analyze educational applications of game-based complex cognitive skills through case studies and write reports: text analysis, problem-solving scenarios, and feedback system construction.

Learners will derive five or more strengths and weaknesses of game-based learning environments using reflective thematic analysis: grammar application, integrated listening/speaking, motivation stimulation, cultural context understanding, and error correction mechanisms.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
